metadata.name: Plant Voices - tranche #1
metadata.description:
The 300 Plant Voices are procedurally generated by a Figma algorithm and then pruned/ curated by the artist Joey Roth

The series will be released in drops of 20 - 50 new Plants. Each drop will be priced according to the current market prices for each rarity level. 

New geometries, textures, and colorways will be revealed with each drop, but the high level trait rarity framework will remain consistent. 

All drops will be pre-minted from the Manifold contract and released on opensea/ looksrare/ rarible. Collectors will choose the plants that appeal to them; no lottery-style blind minting. 

This uncommon drop structure does three important things:

1. slowly grows the community 
2. sustainably adds value to the floor while mitigating price volatility  
3. maximizes expressivity for the artist

A well-paced firework show vs a bombardment 

This is how Joey designed and sold his physical products for over a decade: with full transparency and visual documentation to a small but passionate community of collectors. 

Plant Voices is the beginning of a similar community for on-chain art and design.
